name: 1 Penguin 100 Cases
description: Follow the adventures of Pengoo the penguin through 90 levels full of puzzles. 1 Penguin 100 Cases features hidden object gameplay and cute characters, including penguins, turtles, whales, and even a cockroach! Help Pengoo find his way back home again by solving puzzles and using the items that you find. 1 Penguin 100 Cases is a great game for all ages!
